answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
I have included City Manager Transition Packets from three different cities.
Wichita, Kansas
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/9162/City_Manager_Transition_Packet
Meriden, Connecticut
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/9210/Transition_Plan_A_Status_Report_on_Projects_Programs_and_Assignments
Berlin, Connecticut
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/6898/City_Manager_Arrival_Plan
I also included two articles about starting work in a new city and transitioning city managers.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/5105/Those_First_Days_Can_Be_Well_Almost_Indescribable
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/5620/Your_First_Year_on_the_Job_Conceptualizing_New_Directions
Ali Iannolo
Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org

author: Derek Todd
text: I am looking for a template of a plan of action for the first 90 to 100 days as a manager in a new community.  Thanks!
title: 100 Day Plan
